name: ICOSIA
description:
A small puzzle game about tangled constellations that react to your touch.

Push and pull the stars to unravel the constellations, then solve the puzzle by tracing a path that visits each star only once.

ICOSIA's tactile networks are generated randomly and increase in complexity as you progress, allowing for endless play.

Satisfying sound effects and an ambient soundtrack provide an experience that is relaxing as well as challenging.

Sounds from freesound.org [1] [2] + music by Osmic

Follow me @jecatjecat

Designed for touchscreen - Android recommended
